p: Allelopathic effects of water extract of P. nigrum leaves against several indicator plants such as Phaseolus radiatus, Raphanus sativus, Stylosanthes guianensis, and Amaranthus spinous have been reported. This water extract affected some antioxidant enzymes including superoxide dismutase (SOD), catalase (CAT) and peroxidase (POD) of Rhapanus sativus. It also stimulated malondiadehyde (MDA) accumulation of R. sativus seedling [ 32, 33]. Furthermore, P. nigrum leaching has been noted to possess allelopathic effects on Vigna mungo [ 34]. However, both of P. cubeba and P. nigrum EOs have been not studied yet.
